name: Ladder Build Run
description:
Collect parts of stairs on your shoulder, run fast to defeat other stair racers, avoid from tricky obstacles by making ladders and win the race to be the master of new running games.

In the rush of new runner games of bouncy stair climb, this build ladder with stick gives you finest experience of making ladders and fun running games. Prepare yourself to play the most exciting running games of this year. Collect coins as much as you can in this ladder game by building stairs and prove yourself as best racer of new racing games.
